product_name: Pearl Izumi isoShift Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A stability shoe that improves moderate to severe pronation, the Pearl Izumi syncroFloat(TM) IV women's road-running shoes are built to handle high-mileage training without weighing you down. Graduated Guidace System guides the foot from heel strike to toe-off to correct pronation. Seamless woven polyester mesh uppers offer a fantastic, flexible fit with excellent breathability; thermoplastic urethane overlays offer support and structure. Washable, removable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles supply amazing step-in comfort and long-lasting cushioning; EVA midsoles provide additional full-foot cushioning. Energy heel crash pad softens impact; forefoot Energy Cell adds cushioning and improves energy return; thermoplastic urethane midfoot shanks add torsional support. Outsoles use full carbon rubber for durable stability and reliable traction. The Pearl Izumi isoShift women's road-running shoes are built on the Pearl Izumi training shoe last to fit comfortably during daily use. Closeout.
short_description: A stability shoe that improves moderate to severe pronation, the Pearl Izumi syncroFloat(TM) IV women's road-running shoes are built to handle high-mileage training without weighing you down.
